item.title: Creating Your First Game
item.description: Okay. This is your first game. Don’t go crazy with it, but pick something that sounds kind of cool. Whatever you choose, stick with it. It will pay off. Case Studies While thinking of what you want to make, look at these case studies. Jed | age:22 Dreamlight, 3 Days Unfortunately this was not my first game, but rather to showcase where your skill could end up with a few years of practice, as well as this was the first game I made while also following this guide.
